meanings.definition: A slip of paper detailing an employee's earnings and deductions.
meanings.sent1: I always check my payslip to see how much money I earned.
meanings.sent2: The HR department forgot to include the payslip in my paycheck.
meanings.sent3: When the payslip flew out the window, I had to chase it down the street.
meanings.sent4: The payslip is like a financial report card for your hard work.
meanings.sent5: The payslip fluttered in the wind, revealing the fruits of my labor.

meanings.definition: To provide a payslip to an employee.
meanings.sent1: The accountant will payslip all the employees at the end of the month.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to payslip each staff member before they leave for the day.
meanings.sent3: I will payslip you as soon as I finish calculating your earnings.
meanings.sent4: She payslipped the new recruit promptly to ensure transparency.
meanings.sent5: The manager payslips everyone on time to avoid any confusion.
